question: I'm a 46 yr old man in 3rd stage chf, also have juvenile diabetes, also have severe cervical spinal stenosis. I've been having my pain managed with 10mg Vicodin for the last 6yrs. It's getting to where the pain meds are controlling my life and I have made up my mind to stop. Should I try this on my own are should I have medical help??
title: pictureman
